duties_responsibilities.duty: Cold and warm call leads to establish relationships
Set appointments for company visits or drop-in on leads
Actively go after leads, referrals, and new business
Conduct outside sales, traveling within 50-75 miles of the Greenville, SC area
Maintain relationships with clients to create repeat business
Collect required information to get application process or renewal process started
Maintain proper documentation for all client files
Ensure support staff is conducting all support duties within a timely manner according to application or renewal deadlines
Work in office or out in the field M-F 8 a.m. to 5 p.m. (may be open to hybrid for a great candidate)
Acquire company-paid Life & Health license after starting if not already active
Travel within 50-75 miles of the Greenville location to sell to clients
Work in office (may consider hybrid for the right person)
Move to commission-only in a few years after book of business has been established

education_certification.credential: SC Life & Health license (if not already active)
